mapper.sql: storehouse_id, storehouse_name, storehouse_code, area, type, contact_name, contact_tel, contact_fax, contact_email, contact_address, status, createtime, modifytime, endtime, remark

distinct
from tb_storehouse
order by ${orderByClause}
